name: part_008
file: tmp_【#大空スバル３周年】おまたせ！今日はたのしんでってな～！！！！：SUBARU 3rd anniversary Live【ホロライブ】 [mhvHZpK-9Ss]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: MC section with guests Yuzuki Choco, Himemori Luna, and Shishiro Botan.
Subaru goes offstage for an outfit change, talking to the audience as she does so.
Performance of the song 'Yomosugara Kimi Omou' in a new outfit.

subtitles.original: 今日の温度差半端ない...
subtitles.english: Today's temperature difference is crazy...

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, set...

subtitles.original: 温度誰取ってるんだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder who's taking the temperature?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ちょっと、せーので3周年おめでとうって言ってもらっていい？
subtitles.english: Alright, can you guys say "Happy 3rd anniversary" on "Ready, set"?

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, set...

subtitles.original: 3周年おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Happy 3rd anniversary!

subtitles.original: おめでとうー！ということで、みんな、ちょこるなーたんでした！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! So, everyone, that was Choco-Luna-Tan!

subtitles.original: みんなまたねー！
subtitles.english: See you later, everyone!

subtitles.original: ありがとうねー！おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: またねー！
subtitles.english: See you!

subtitles.original: 黒子、黒子...
subtitles.english: Black-clad stagehand, stagehand...

subtitles.original: なかよし。か。
subtitles.english: Friend... ly.

subtitles.original: はい！ということでですね！じゃあ、ここからはね、
subtitles.english: Alright! So! From here on,

subtitles.original: またどんどんジャンジャンバリバリ踊っていきたいと思うんですけども！
subtitles.english: I'm going to keep dancing more and more!

subtitles.original: まあその前に、一旦お着替えタイムいきたいと思いますので、みんなちょっと待っててください。
subtitles.english: But before that, I'm going to take a break for an outfit change, so please wait a moment.

subtitles.original: そいじゃあみんな待っててね！行ってきまーす！
subtitles.english: So everyone, wait for me, okay? I'm off!

subtitles.original: よいしょ。よいしょ。お水飲んで。
subtitles.english: Heave-ho. Heave-ho. Drinking water...

subtitles.original: はぁ！
subtitles.english: Haa!

subtitles.original: よし！
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: よし！
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: 行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Here I go!

subtitles.original: おっちゃー！戻ってきたよー！
subtitles.english: Ocha! I'm back!

subtitles.original: ということで！まあここからはもう後半戦差し掛かってるので！
subtitles.english: So! We're already heading into the second half of the show!

subtitles.original: でも！後半戦だからって！まだまだいけるよな！盛り上がっていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: But! Just because it's the second half, doesn't mean we can't keep going! Let's get fired up!

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください、夜もすがら君想ふ。
subtitles.english: Now, please listen. "Yomosugara Kimi Omou".

subtitles.original:
夜もすがら君想ふ
作詞・作曲: TOKOTOKO
subtitles.english:
Yomosugara Kimi Omou
Lyrics/Composition: TOKOTOKO

subtitles.original: 僕が生まれる前よりも ずっと昔から続くように
subtitles.english: Just like it's been continuing since long before I was born

subtitles.original: そういつも傷つけ合ってまた愛し合うのさ
subtitles.english: We always hurt each other like that, and then love each other again

subtitles.original: 結婚や仕事のトークに またちょっと疲れてたとしても
subtitles.english: Even if we're a bit tired of talking about marriage and work again

subtitles.original: そう僕の独り言なんかじゃあない 分かってるのさ
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm just talking to myself. I know that.

subtitles.original: Hey! 明けない夜はないと
subtitles.english: Hey! They say there's no night that doesn't end

subtitles.original: 夜明け前がただ暗いと
subtitles.english: And that it's just darkest before the dawn

subtitles.original: この先待つ明日が そんなに輝くもんかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if the tomorrow waiting ahead will really shine that much

subtitles.original: 今 I love you で始まる僕らを もっと照らしてくれよ
subtitles.english: Now, shine more light on us as we begin with "I love you"

subtitles.original: 変わらない愛や希望の類いもまだ 信じてみたいのさ
subtitles.english: I still want to believe in things like unchanging love and hope

subtitles.original: ほら I miss you で諦めムードでも 吹き飛ばしてくれよ
subtitles.english: Look, even if there's a mood of giving up with "I miss you", blow it away

subtitles.original: 時代柄暗い話題が待ち受けても 愛を謳う
subtitles.english: Even if dark topics await us in this day and age, I'll sing of love

subtitles.original: 僕が取るに足らないことで いつも悩んだりしてるのは
subtitles.english: The reason I'm always worrying about trivial things is...

subtitles.original: 言っちゃえばアダムとイブからもう 決まってたのさ
subtitles.english: To put it simply, it's been decided since Adam and Eve

subtitles.original: Hey! なんとなく恋に落ちて
subtitles.english: Hey! Falling in love for no particular reason

subtitles.original: いつの間にか本気だって
subtitles.english: And before I knew it, I was serious

subtitles.original: 張り裂けそうな胸の奥を 打ち明けなくちゃかな
subtitles.english: I guess I have to reveal what's deep inside my bursting heart

subtitles.original: 行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: 今 I love you で始まる僕らを もっと満たしてくれよ
subtitles.english: Now, fill us up more as we begin with "I love you"

subtitles.original: イメージ通りに運ばぬ僕らでも まだ信じてみたいのさ
subtitles.english: Even if things don't go as we imagined, I still want to believe

subtitles.original: ほら I miss you で賞味期限がある Oh yes! 急かしてくれよ
subtitles.english: Look, with "I miss you", there's an expiration date. Oh yes! Hurry me up

subtitles.original: 時代柄暗い未来が待ち受けても 愛を謳う
subtitles.english: Even if a dark future awaits us in this day and age, I'll sing of love

subtitles.original: あの日夜明け前まで 君の声が聴きたい Oh yeah!
subtitles.english: I want to hear your voice until before the dawn that day. Oh yeah!

subtitles.original:
ミオンちゃまへ！
インスタやらん？ｗ なんだかんだ素直なミオンちゃま好き！！
これからもよろしくね！！！
subtitles.english:
To Mion-chama!
Wanna do Insta? lol I like the surprisingly honest Mion-chama!!
Let's keep being friends!!!

subtitles.original:
あくあへ！
SAO次いつ見るの！！ 2期いつもまとめてくれてありがとー！！
あくあが同期でよかった！
subtitles.english:
To Aqua!
When are we watching SAO next!! Thanks for always summarizing season 2!!
I'm glad Aqua is my genmate!

subtitles.original:
ちょこ先へ！
またおとまりしよー！！！ ちょこ先は行動力の鬼すぎで尊敬してる！！
またアウトレット行こう！ｗ
subtitles.english:
To Choco-sen!
Let's have another sleepover!!! Choco-sen is a beast when it comes to taking action, I respect you!!
Let's go to the outlet again! lol

subtitles.original:
あやめどのへ！
あやめどのご飯食べたい！！ あとミオさんにも会いたいぞ！
あやめも3年だ！ 4年目もよろしくな！！
subtitles.english:
To Ayame-dono!
I want to eat Ayame-dono's cooking!! Also I want to see Mio-san!
It's been 3 years for Ayame too! Let's do our best in our 4th year!!

subtitles.original: 今 I love you で始まる僕らを もっと照らしてくれよ
subtitles.english: Now, shine more light on us as we begin with "I love you"

subtitles.original: 変わらない愛や希望の類いもまだ 信じてみたいのさ
subtitles.english: I still want to believe in things like unchanging love and hope

subtitles.original: ほら I miss you で諦めムードでも 吹き飛ばしてくれよ
subtitles.english: Look, even if there's a mood of giving up with "I miss you", blow it away

subtitles.original: 時代柄暗い話題が待ち受けても 愛を謳う
subtitles.english: Even if dark topics await us in this day and age, I'll sing of love
